title: Stifado for a crowd
ingredients: ['2.75kg beef stewing steak', '120ml olive oil', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '2.75kg small white onions, peeled', '170g tomato puree', '125ml red wine', '125ml red wine vinegar', '6 cloves garlic', '1 teaspoon pickling spice', '1 bay leaf', '1 cinnamon stick', '1/2 teaspoon dried rosemary', 'salt and pepper to taste']
